title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.100 - Donated services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.100 - Donated services

State Regulations

The services performed by personnel who receive no
compensation or partial compensation for their services. The equivalent of an
employer-employee relationship must exist between the institution and the
individual donating the services. The term is usually applied to services
rendered, by members of religious orders, societies or similar groups, to
institutions operated by or affiliated with such
institutions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.100

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
